page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE OF DAWN T.
page.content: I get up at 7.3Oam. At 8.OOam I have { {cornflakes}for my{breakfast}then I get my things for school ready. I set off for school at 8.4Oam and the walk takes me lO minutes. In the morning we do{reading}and{maths.}I like reading and do a lot at home. At{dinnertime} I go home because the{teachers}are involved in a pay dispute and refuse to cover lunch duties. When I get home I normally have{peanut butter {sandwiches.}School starts again at l.OOpm. Sometimes in the afternoon we go see the{headteacher}for half an hour's{English,}otherwise we do{ {topicwork, art}or{creative writing.} When I get home from school I watch the television. My favourite is "Fraggle Rock" which is a sort of puppet programme. At 6.OOpm we have our{tea}I always hope it's{hot-dog and {chips!}At 8.OOpm I go to bed.
